title: Parliament Budget Session 2022 Live Updates: If Cong wasn’t there, Emergency, Sikh riots, Kashmiri Pandits exodus wouldn’t have happened, says PM Modi - The Indian Express
content:
1. Parliament Budget Session 2022 Live Updates: If Cong wasn’t there, Emergency, Sikh riots, Kashmiri Pandits exodus wouldn’t have happened, says PM Modi  The Indian Express
  2. "Congress Leader Of 'Tukde-Tukde' Gang": PM's All-Out Attack In Parliament  NDTV
  3. 'They instigated migrants to defy Covid lockdown': PM Modi tears into Congress, attacks AAP  Times of India
  4. PM invokes Nehru to corner Congress in House  Hindustan Times
  5. Morning digest: Congress is leader of ‘tukde-tukde’ gang, says PM Modi in Lok Sabha; Home ministry seeks more time to frame CAA rules, and more  The Hindu
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Budget Session 2022 India, Parliament LIVE Updates, 8 February: While replying to the debate on Motion of Thanks to President's address in Rajya Sabha on Tuesday, PM Modi said that everyone must focus on how to take country forward in next 25 years when India completes 100 years of Independence.
